#homebasedlearning has been a whirlwind of adventure. We're blessed to have the resources to think out of the 📦, delivering w/ Pre-K through engaging & interactive ways w/ a one stop portal for easy access to books & websites. #virtualclassroom #GEMSSingapore #EYPYGEMS https://t.co/jdRhvYB34P

In Pre-K, we encourage creativity & togetherness while learning 🌈 in a bilingual manner. Inviting Ss & families to snap photo/s wearing the same colour/s & have fun!
